summary: Roulette is a popular casino game that originated from the Italian game Biribi. Players can bet on a number, color (red or black), or whether the number is odd/even or high/low. A croupier spins a wheel with numbered pockets and a ball. The ball lands in a pocket, determining the winning number. If you guess right, you win money! It's named after the French word for "little wheel."
title: Roulette
